Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.function

Class Summary
AeAbstractBpelFunction Base class for standard IAeFunction impls.
AeAbstractBpelFunctionContext A IAeFunctionContext implementation that handles returning common BPEL functions.
AeAbstractFunctionContext Base class for implementing FunctionContext impls that implement the IAeFunctionContext interface.
AeBase64EncodeFunction Implements the abx:base64Encode(stringValue,[charSet]) custom function.
AeBPWSBpelFunctionContext A IAeFunctionContext implementation that handles returning standard BPEL 1.1 functions.
AeDoXslTransformFunction An implementation of BPEL 2.0's doXslTransform() XPath function.
AeExtensionFunctionContext A FunctionContext implementation that handles returning BPEL extension functions.
AeGetLinkStatusFunction Class representing the XPath function used by expression evaluator to handle the BPEL getLinkStatus function call.
AeGetMyRolePropertyFunction Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL getVariableData() function call.
AeGetProcessIdFunction Class representing the XPath function used by the expression evaluator to handle the BPEL extension function call getProcessId().
AeGetProcessNameFunction Class representing the XPath function used by the expression evaluator to handle the BPEL extension function call getProcessName().
AeGetVariableDataFunction Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL getVariableData() function call.
AeGetVariablePropertyFunction Class representing the XPath function used by expression evaluator to handle the BPEL getVariableProperty function call.
AeResolveURNFunction Implements the abx:resolveURN() custom fuction.
AeUtilityFunctionContext Implements a Jaxen function context that provides a few simple utility functions.
AeUtilityFunctionContext.AePrintlnFunction Implements a simple Jaxen function that writes its arguments to the Java console.
AeUtilityFunctionContext.AeReadlnFunction Implements a simple Jaxen function that prompts the user for console input and returns the user's input.
AeUtilityFunctionContext.AeSleepFunction Implements a simple Jaxen function that puts the current thread to sleep.
AeWSBPELBpelFunctionContext A BPEL 2.0 version of the standard bpel function context.
 

Exception Summary
AeInvalidFunctionContextException Generated when the addition of a function context fails.
